name: damp

effect.sun_moon: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.

short_effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Prevents the use of explosive moves such as Self-Destruct by dampening its surroundings.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Prevents the use of explosive moves such as Self-Destruct by dampening its surroundings.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Prevents the use of explosive moves, such as Self-Destruct, by dampening its surroundings.
